title: The Reluctant Central Banker
description: Do central bankers have too much power? Paul Tucker, a former official at the Bank of England during the 2008 financial crisis and author of the new book 'Unelected Power,' explains to Kate and Luigi how technocratic hubris can imperil democracy.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
